mention.text: Mount Unzen , 610 miles southwest of Tokyo
chairman of the National Disaster Coordinating Council
an abandoned residential area along the Mizunashi River.
Shimabara port , five miles east of the 4,485-foot volcano
a railway as it swept through Shimabara
The observatory monitoring Mount Unzen said volcanic debris still covering the east side of the mountain
